RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 13100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances ) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BREAKTHROUGH sprinted clear at once, maintained advantage, held sway to wire. K W CAPTAIN HOOK chased winner throughout to no avail settled for place spot. WHISTLEWHILEYOUMOW saved ground to the stretch, ran on for show spot inside. NO COMMISSION raced along evenly with no late kick in the stretch run. ENGLISH CLASSIC failed to menace from inside. REVOLUTIONARY ROAD never menaced throughout. Race 1 was hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: Whistlewhileyoumow
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the stretch, ran on for show spot inside

ENTRY.NAME: No Commission
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly while well off inside through the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Revolutionary Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: K W Captain Hook
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout to no avail settled for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Breakthrough
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear at once, maintained advantage, held sway to wire

ENTRY.NAME: English Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace from inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 7, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOCK ON chased to turn, took over into the stretch to go clear in late. THIS ILL DEFEND inside to turn, angled out into the stretch run for place spot. CAPE MARCO DRIVE reserved to the turn, rallied along for the show spot late. MUSTANG WILLIE awkward from gate, no late response when needed in the drive. UNCAPTURED PULSE chased to turn, dueled into stretch stopped readily in the drive.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside to turn, angled out into the stretch run for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1 1/16M Turf CR: 84. Allowance Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming R aces Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZING rated back to far turn, rallied along under strong handling into the stretch to go clear in the final seventy yards. MISS GOODBAR no speed to far turn, came running outside into stretch for place. RECOGNIZE ME pinched back start while along evenly for the show spot. HATTIE M saved ground throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. COMMANDERS PALACE chased pace to far turn, popped a head in front, dueled weakened. PASSO A FRENTE close to the half, shuffled back far turn with no late response. TWIRLING PATTI inside speed to the front, stayed to far turn, dueled, gave in. Race was hand timed. Acm

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, stayed to far turn, dueled, gave in

Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Rac es Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCKEYE PRINCESS sat chilly to the turn, took over to go clear in easy fashion to the wire. MIZZEN THE POINT never far back to turn, took up chase to no avail, best of rest. PRICELESS PICTURE no speed to turn, raced along in the stretch for show spot. SORORITY SISTER chased leaders to the turn while never a menace in the stretch. STORM OF NINETEEN speed to the front, stayed to quarter pole, gave way readily. DELIGHTFUL CAT never menaced throughout. STATE OF GRACE never menaced. CARLY'S FLIGHT stopped quickly from inside.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 85. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pre ferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARTFUL HOPE no speed to the stretch with an outside run to go clear in the late going under good handling to the wire. MIDNIGHT GRIND pressed pace four wide to turn, led into stretch but outgamed in the late stages. MORNIN' BOSS dueled between to stretch run, weakened for the show spot. D'ORO STREET inside speed, battled to the stretch weakened in the final stages. MY HEAD HURTS no speed to the stretch, improved position in the late going. ONE MORE NIGHT saved ground to no avail with no response when needed. MOTOWN MISCHIEF sharp break, outsprinted quickly from between horses to turn.

ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, improved position in the late going

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to no avail with no response when needed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INNER HARBOR sprinted off to a sizable lead to the turn while well in hand while easily to the wirey. SOULSTONE outside run to turn, stayed on for place while no match. TWITTER TRAFFIC raced along evenly while no match for top pair in the stretch. ABIGAIL G skimmed the rail to no avail. MAXIMUM JOY lunged in the air and missed the start while never a factor thereafter.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHECK THE FACTS inside run to turn, angled three wide into stretch and cleared away in the final furlong while ridden out to the finish. DISCO MUSIC chased to turn, took over into stretch while no match for winner. FATHER FRANK quick to the front, collared into turn, faded back from inside.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to turn, angled three wide into stretch, cleared away

ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front, collared into turn, faded back from inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 7, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pr ice $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARSHIP NUGGET bit tardy from gate, unhurried to the half, steady run to clear off in good order. AYY LADIES broke sharp outside, pressed to far turn, clear, headed no match. MAGESTAL BASTIDA broke tardy from the gate, no speed while along for show spot outside. COLUMN pressed pace inside to far turn, nothing left emptied out stretch. FABIOLA PRINCESS inside speed to the half, gave way from far turn readily. C V THUNDER had a steady fade from the half, dropped far back.
